      <inherit name="editor_player" />

      <inherit name="northdirection" />
    </exit>

    </exit>
  </object>

      JS.openCompass ()
      game.notarealturn = true

    </exit>
  </object>
  <object name="southern room">

      <inherit name="northdirection" />
    </exit>

</asl>
